meanings.definition: Causing or likely to cause an argument; controversial.
meanings.sent1: The contentious issue divided the group into two opposing sides.
meanings.sent2: The debate became contentious when neither side would compromise.
meanings.sent3: The contentious topic of pizza toppings sparked a heated discussion.
meanings.sent4: Their contentious relationship was like a stormy sea, always turbulent.
meanings.sent5: The contentious atmosphere in the room was palpable, filled with tension.

meanings.sent5: The contentious exchange of words echoed through the room, leaving everyone on edge.
